items.content_html: qryn is an indie polyglot, lightweight high-performance observability stack with ClickHouse storage, designed to ingest and analyze logs, metrics and traces from any agent compatible with Loki, Prometheus, OTLP, Tempo, Elastic, InfluxDB, Opentelemetry and more! Grafana Cloud, Splunk, Datadog, Otel drop-in alternative

items.content_html: The "An Ayah A Day Chrome Extension" is a lightweight browser extension designed to display a random ayat from the Holy Quran with details. The extension enhances user experience by providing a quick and convenient way to listen to that ayat also.
items.title: hiashraful/An-Ayah-A-Day: The "An Ayah A Day Chrome Extension" is a lightweight browser extension designed to display a random ayat from the Holy Quran with details.  The extension enhances user experience by providing a quick and convenient way to listen to that ayat also.

items.content_html: TaskLab is a lightweight issue tracking and project management system for teams to manage their projects, tasks, and workflows. TaskLab allows teams to create and create projects, track tasks, and collaborate on projects in real-time.

items.content_html: Mobile-friendly web-app for remote workers. Orgs/ projects can post jobs/gigs & hire applicants by paying few Sats. Applicants apply to most jobs/ gigs for free (unless required by orgs/ projects to fight application spam). Our platform distinguishes itself through Nostr and LN for payments & reputation management. Lightweight matchmaking service.
items.title: Bitshala-Incubator/upsats: Mobile-friendly web-app for remote workers. Orgs/ projects can post jobs/gigs & hire applicants by paying few Sats. Applicants apply to most jobs/ gigs for free (unless required by orgs/ projects to fight application spam). Our platform distinguishes itself through Nostr and LN for payments & reputation management. Lightweight matchmaking service.
